text:
$personName looks a little nervous, but relaxes after seeing your image." Go ahead, Captain, what's up"
OR
"Greetings to you, friend of the company. There are many crazy people in this Sector; fortunately we are not one of them."
OR
"Captains like you often need marines for missions, right? The company has a program to train ordinary crew members to become marines; if you are interested, ask the salesman in the communications directory of the business center for details."

The image of $personName stares at you without saying a word in the ripple caused by the unstable connection of the communicator, and after a short silence he turns his head away from the camera.
OR
"If only I could add even one more scratch to your fleet, damn it."

"Isn't this the time for some rousing speeches?" The captain of the company smiles at you with defiance, "Today, let's meet on the battlefield."
OR
"I like challenging assignments and I never fail to deliver." $personName says these words through gritted teeth: "Today is no different."

"I'll assign each of your ships 2,000 shells each, I'm sure."
OR
"Only the side with the greater power can decide; today you have no right to decide."
OR
"Maybe you can run away for a while before I begin blowing your fleet into wreckage."
$personName gives you a professional smile: "Hello, welcome to the front desk, what can I do for you?"
options:
0:aEP_offer_remain_part01:Ask $personName "I heard that you are buying salvage parts?"
1:aEP_marine_training01:Ask $personName "I want to train some Marines"
#2:aEP_hair_security01:Want to hire a  patrol to improve the security of the star system I control
3:cutCommLink:"I'm just browsing."

text: $personName looks at you with surprise, "Are you serious? I think you've been classified as a dangerous person."

"One of our services at the Company involves the recycling these valuable parts. Perhaps you can sell it as raw material elsewhere, but we understand its true value - and as such, if you were to hand them to us, it would help us a lot, and of course the same goes for you, as we will also offer you some unique rewards in addition to a substantial bonus."

options:
0:aEP_offer_remain_part03:Exchange salvaged parts for special rewards
1:aEP_offer_remain_part02:Exchange salvaged parts for Credits
2:cutCommLink:"I'll think about it."
0:cutCommLink:"I'm afraid I don't have one of those right now."

text: "You can't get these things without some connections."
options:
0:aEP_part03_ShowShipBpList:Exchange for ship blueprints
1:aEP_part03_ShowBpPackList:Exchange for blueprint packages
2:cutCommLink:"I'll think about it."

text: "Of course, we offer crew-oriented courses in equipment operation, precision shooting, tactical maneuvers, simulated confrontations, and a host of other programs to ensure that their combat capabilities are at the level of regular Marine when their training is completed."
"Very well, training will be completed in about 3 months, at which time your crew will be re-boarded when you visit a non-hostile space station."

options: 0:marketVisitBar:"Go get a drink at the nearest bar"

conditions:
$id == aEP_FSF_DefStation
$faction.id == aEP_FSF
$faction.AWM_MetYang == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldStart
$faction.AWM_1Complete == false
text: Some time after docking, you are hanging out in the unrestricted area of the port when you get a communication request from someone inside the company: "I know about you, can we talk about it? I have a job offer for you here."
options:
0:aEP_researcher_stage0_GreetAccept:"Tell me the details."
1:aEP_researcher_stage0_GreetDecline:"Sorry, I'm busy at the moment."

text: "Trust me, you will not regret it, though I would like you to switch to your personal comms, this matter involves some confidentiality."
"Now do you have some time? While this job will involve some confidential material, I promise you that the payoff is more than you can imagine."
options:
0:aEP_researcher_stage0_talk01:"Tell me the details."
1:cutCommLink:"Sorry, I'm still rather busy as of now."

text: "Even though I personally trust your strength and competence, it would be troublesome to get involved with you given your current relationship with the Company. We'll talk about other things when you've resolved your reputation with us."
"I'm the program director of the FSF's Advanced Weapons Program, $personName. how do you have my contact information? I don't think I've listed it in the public directory."

"Well, let's just make this official." - while you're looking at your personal terminal, $personFirstName himself has found you in the unrestricted section. "Although you don't look as legendary as the things you've done,  we should find a place to sit down and talk. If you don't mind, let's head to my office."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage0_talk02:"Maybe you should tell me what kind of work it is first."

text:
"Can't say too much until I have your cooperation, this matter involves the Company's secrets. But I am confident that a captain like you should be quite interested in the latest products from the Company's secret research institute". You half-heartedly follow $personFirstName, into the depths of the restricted area.

From the looks of things $heOrShe should have fairly high clearance, at least high enough to bring a stranger through the fortress unhindered. After some time on foot, you arrive at what appears to be a design office. Walking through the side-by-side offices along the way, you can see the drawings on the computers inside, and as a captain you immediately realize that what this place is designing are shipboard weapons.

After walking through the office area, you ascend an escalator to what appears to be the management area. In front of the office with "Project Manager" on the door, $personFirstName swipes a card, opening the door.

$personFirstName sits down on $heOrShe's seat and says to you while operating the terminal, "To make it short, I want you to collect some weapons for me in the name of your fleet," $heOrShe sends a detailed message to your personal terminal, detailing what is needed.
options:
0:aEP_researcher_stage0_talk04:"I feel like I'm entitled to some explanation at least."
1:aEP_researcher_stage0_AskAccept:Continue

text:
"Very interested in the matter, I like that.", $heOrShe says as she stops what she is doing and gets up and walks around to you, crossing her arms over her chest and leaning her back against the wall. "I should formally introduce myself;, I am the director of the 'Advanced Weapons Program', the AWP for short, a sort of researcher but not the kind you are usually thinking of."

"My job is to ensure the smooth running of the project, which means being familiar with various 'channels' such as you, Captain.", $personFirstName left the wall and continued while returning to $hisOrHer's computer desk, "I've researched your exploits and believe that building a relationship with you would be beneficial to both me personally and the company."

"I can't say much about the 'Advanced Weapons Program', just go with the name for now. For some tasks, going through the process takes more effort than getting a capable independent captain like you to handle them, which is why I've spent all the trouble looking for you. If you accept, in return I will give you some prototype weapons that are not available on the market; do think of it as helping us test the data, rest assured they are feature-complete and operational in all manner, just not mass produced for various reasons."
"Do you accept this mission?"
"Very well, I hope you will not fail - for the sake of further cooperation."
"If you come around to changing your mind, you can contact me again."
"Continuing where we left off?"
"How's it going?"
options: 0:cutCommLink:"I'm afraid you'll have to wait a few more days."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_1Accepted == true
$faction.AWM_1Talked == true
$faction.AWM_MetYang == true 
$faction.AWM_1Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission check1 SCORE:100
script:
ShowPersonVisual
$faction.AWM_1Complete = true
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission complete1
aEP_HandInParts aEP_long_barrel_chaingunAP -2 none 0
text: "Very well, your performance proves that I was right, perhaps we will work more together afterwards."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage0_Complete_talk01:"Let me see what's so special about the payoff."

text: "As the name of the department suggests, we are responsible for weapons development in the Company, Naturally there were many projects that were close to success but were dropped because they were either too costly or too unreliable in harsh environments, and we don't want these 'experiments' to just sit in storage and rot."

conditions:
$id == aEP_FSF_DefStation
$faction.id == aEP_FSF
$faction.AWM_2MetYang == false
$faction.AWM_1Complete == true
$faction.AWM_2Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldStart2
text: As you approach the space station you are greeted with a message from within the company, "Captain, I have a new job for you here, feel free to contact me if you are interested - you know my comms ID after all."
"It was a simple collaboration before and you have clearly proved yourself capable of engaging in a deeper level of cooperation, unfortunately I don't have an assignment for you at the moment."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_2MetYang == true
$faction.AWM_1Complete == true
$faction.AWM_2Talked == false
$faction.AWM_2Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldStart2
text:
After picking up the comms, you meet up in the commercial area of the open area of the station, $personName this time is not wearing the Institute's clothes, but the FSF uniform, looking more like a commanding officer of some sort belonging to the company. Like last time, $heOrShe leads you through the restricted area like nobody's business, but this time instead of going to the Institute, you go straight into the military area.

Eventually you stop at some sort of conference room, where a presentation seems to have been held earlier, with a central holographic projection of a ship you can't identify floating in the asteroid belt, presumably some sort of self-replicating unmanned probe ship from the rough structural finish and the painted Domain of Man pattern.

$personFirstName stands by and waits for you to finish examining the strange ship, then gestures and the holographic projection begins to play the aftermath. The drone ship stays silent while asteroids float around, and the moment a certain asteroid is about to hit the drone ship, it creates a shield.

$personFirstName looks at the tablet in $hisOrHer hand and says to you, "This mission is urgent. The requirement is to destroy this particular Domain-era unmanned probe ship and bring back its shield core."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage1_talk02:"Looks like some kind of unmanned probe with shields installed, what's so unique about it that you can't handle it?"

text:
As if $heOrShe knew this query would come up, $personFirstName flips the tablet over in his hand, displaying a battle report from one of the FSF fleets, explaining like you did, "Three months ago a company-employed exploration fleet discovered this unique drone ship, the source of the hologram you just saw. The company then sent a medium sized combat fleet to recover the drone ship, and a firefight ensued."

$heOrShe hands you the tablet and says: "The results are on this report. After suffering light sized losses, the fleet commander judged that although he could have won the engagement, he would have caused a lot of unnecessary damage and so applied to command to have another, larger fleet deal with it - given the special nature of this ship, I felt you would be the best person to do so."
options:
0:aEP_researcher_stage1_talk03:"Why am I the best person for the job? I don't really understand."
1:aEP_researcher_stage1_talk04:"Tell me about the characteristics of the target, I need more information."

text:
$personFirstName stands across from you and laughs out loud, rushing to cover $hisOrHer mouth with $hisOrHer hand and says, "I'm so sorry $playerName, it looks like you're a bit slower to the uptake than I thought." Sensing that $personFirstName means no harm, you smile back to hide your embarrassment.

"Simple question, firstly this is a very special drone ship and our Institute wants its data very badly, it is equally important to keep it out of the hands of other powers. Secondly, a medium battle fleet followed immediately by a large battle fleet heading towards the same place will be the talk of the star field no matter what they bring back. That's why this would be a lot more trouble for the company to do than for you to do it - no one is going to be watching where independent captains are flying all day, and it's better to let this ship be a secret than provoke a troublesome scuffle over it."

$personFirstName fiddles with the tablet a few times, pulls up a document, and hands it back to you while explaining, "What makes this drone ship special is not just that it 'has' shields, installing shields on an unshielded ship is not that difficult, all it takes is an ai with faulty logic. what really caught our attention was its impossibly good shield efficiency. According to the description in the previous engagement report, the ship's shields only began to show instability after taking several times the damage of a conventional ship's shield absorption limit, and the fleet's technical officer judged that with the current firepower strength to overload its shields the fleet would suffer greater losses."

Seeing your half-hearted look, $personFirstName doesn't show you any more information, but continues, "Aside from the unreasonable shields, the rest of the ship, like its counterparts in the sector, can simply be called 'serviceable' - which means there are many ways you can take it apart."
"I'll pay part of it in advance, but it's something that hasn't been put into mass production and the Company doesn't have a lot of it."
"Do you accept this mission?"
"Good luck, I wouldn't want the Company to lose such a promising partner."
"This mission is no child's play, you should think about it."
"So, what do you think?"
"Are you in trouble?"
options: 0:cutCommLink:"I'm afraid you'll have to wait a few more days."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_2Accepted == true
$faction.AWM_2Talked == true
$faction.AWM_2MetYang == true 
$faction.AWM_2Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission check2 SCORE:100
script:
ShowPersonVisual
$faction.AWM_2Complete = true
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission complete2
aEP_HandInParts aEP_railway_gun -1 none 0
text: "We have received the shield generator you removed to pay... Once a very rewarding achievement for the Company, the only prototype that has been produced so far is this one, although it is now less valuable than this task you have completed. I hope this...somewhat unsuccessful candidate will be able to demonstrate its brilliance in your hands."
options: 0:cutCommLink:"Just this one? Quite a sincere payment."

conditions:
$id == aEP_FSF_DefStation
$faction.id == aEP_FSF
$faction.AWM_3MetYang == false
$faction.AWM_2Complete == true
$faction.AWM_3Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldStart3
text: As you approach the station, you are greeted with a familiar communication request, "Urgent mission, come quickly". From the brief content you can sense that something unusual is afoot.
"It's good to see you, $playerName, there's no need for you to be out there so much these days, maybe we can cultivate a personal relationship."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_3MetYang == true
$faction.AWM_2Complete == true
$faction.AWM_3Talked == false
$faction.AWM_3Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldStart3
text: "Your arrival at this time is of great help, I now have a very urgent matter that requires your abilities - head to restricted area deck R024, I will be waiting for you there."
As your shuttle comes into dock, you look through the porthole and see $personFirstName standing in the crowd swinging $hisOrHer head from side to side looking for your vessel.
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage2_talk02:"Its quite rare，$personFirstName, to see you in a state of distress."

text:
$personFirstName nods at your noting of $hisOrHer discomfort, and without hesitation leads you in the direction of the Advanced Weapons Program laboratories, passing through the same office area you passed last time, and arriving at $hisOrHer office.

As the office door closes, $personFirstName has seriousness written all over $hisOrHer face. "This time, it's very serious," $heOrShe says to you with a frown, "one of our prototype ships has been intercepted."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage2_talk03:Ask about the details of this matter

text:
$heOrShe props one hand on the table and leans forward to explain the situation to you. $personFirstName had commissioned the Commercial Centre's Orbital Factory to build a ship designed by the Advanced Weapons Program project team, but had lost all contact during the first test voyage, and subsequently received a blackmail message from pirates.

"We have enough information to suggest that the test fleet was not simply hijacked from the outside by the pirates, but that someone hacked into the flagship's systems during the contact and sent orders to the surrounding fleet to surrender, allowing the pirates to easily take over the entire fleet." ,said $personFirstName pausing for a moment, "This means that we have a mole in our test fleet, and it also means that this group of pirates now has a military grade fleet."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage2_talk04:"I can understand why you are so anxious."

text: "That's not the main reason for my anxiety, the real big problem is the weapon system on this prototype ship, it's an over-the-horizon strike cruise missile that can destroy a small fleet before sensors can detect an image of the enemy fleet, if a strategic level weapon from our hands flows to the pirates and is used by them to attack other forces, we have a big problem, this is a problem that involves the entire Sector. The Hegemony won't just sit idly by...in any case, I want you to destroy that fleet; as for the prototype ship, you can keep it for yourself or give it to us, I trust you won't abuse it."
options: 0:aEP_researcher_stage2_AskAccept:"Looks like this is a really serious matter."

text: "Do you accept this mission?"
"Approach quickly and then make quick work of it, Commander. I suspect they're going to test the power of the cruise missiles, and you'll be a target at long range."
"This mission is no child's play, you should think about it."
"So, what do you think?"
"Have you met with any trouble?"
options: 0:cutCommLink:"I'm afraid you'll have to wait a few more days."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_3Accepted == true
$faction.AWM_3Talked == true
$faction.AWM_3MetYang == true 
$faction.AWM_3Complete == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission check3 SCORE:100
text: "The message shows that the signal of this prototype ship in the pirate fleet has disappeared, thanks to you in this matter. Although the data of the prototype ship is still there, if you succeed in recovering that prototype ship you can hand it back to us, it will save us a lot of time."

conditions:
$isaEP_Researcher 
!$faction.isHostile
$faction.AWM_3Accepted == true
$faction.AWM_3Talked == true
$faction.AWM_3MetYang == true 
$faction.AWM_3Complete == true
$faction.AWM_3DidExchange == false
aEP_AdvanceWeaponMission shouldGive3
text: "You managed to recover this prototype ship? Very well, I can give you a different warship as compensation if you'll return it to us."
"Thank you for your cooperation."
"Nevermind, there's no harm in leaving it in your hands."
options: 0:cutCommLink:"We'll talk about it in a while."

"It's good to see you, $playerName, there's no need for you to be out there so much these days, maybe we can cultivate a personal relationship."
